definition-item.definition-title: SPECIAL FURNITURE, FITTINGS, OR ACCESSORIES FOR SHOPS, STOREHOUSES, BARS, RESTAURANTS OR THE LIKE; PAYING COUNTERS

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Furniture for use in the commercial area, i.e. special furniture, fittings or accessories for shops, storehouses, bars, restaurants, museums or the like.
This subclass also relates to the furniture aspects of paying counters.
Racks and containers for displaying and dispensing merchandise in shops, restaurants or other such catering establishments;
Show cases or show cabinets;
Refrigerated or air-conditioned show cases, cabinets or counters for use in shops, restaurants or the like;
Display trays, tables or containers;
Show stands, racks, shelves, shelving units and accessories therefor;
Show stands, racks or shelves adapted for particular articles or materials;
Mannequins, dummies or busts;
Shop, bar, bank or like counters;
Paying counters;
Check-out counters of self-service shops;
Self-service shop type system furniture;
Restaurant service system furniture;
Arrangements in shop windows;
Shop arrangements bringing about special optical effects;
Shop accessories for handling merchandise.

This sub-class is primarily intended for furniture, fittings or accessories for commerce purposes. Furniture for office or domestic use is covered in sub-class A47B, although certain subject-matter, mainly that relating to cabinets and shelving units, is common to both these sub-classes. Warehouse storage and transport systems, including racks or shelving units generally of a larger scale, are covered in sub-class B65G.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Visual display units, as in computer or television screens
Server racks, racks for electronic equipment

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Receptacles, cases or boxes for specific purposes
Walls, partitions in general building construction
Small building structures arranged in other buildings
Devices for fastening or securing constructional elements
Frames, supports or stands for apparatus in general
Data processing systems or methods specially adapted for commercial purposes
Holders or supports for advertising media

section-body.paragraph-text: Classification in head group and sub-groups.
If a document concerns embodiments which are covered by several sub-groups dependent upon a higher hierarchy group, the following rules apply:

list-item.paragraph-text: the specific technical information relevant for some of the sub-groups is classified (EC) in all said sub-groups.

if relevant, the structural association (e.g. the combination) of the elements covered by the sub-groups is classified (EC) in the head group; the document may also be Indexing Code for the sub-groups concerned.

analogously, if generic technical information common to a number of the sub-groups is disclosed and only schematic embodiments of the specific subgroup embodiments are represented, the document is classified (EC) in the head group and may be Indexing Code for the subgroups.

section-body.paragraph-text: Classification of additional information:

Although not compulsory, in many cases the classification of additional information (e.g. particular technical aspect of a piece of furniture) may be useful in classification and subsequent retrieval of such documents and is therefore considered very desirable.
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: The act of displaying to view or notice (Oxford English Dictionary); Used together with a term referring to products, merchandise or a device it is meant to be understood as a device for physically, as opposed to virtually or representatively, displaying items of merchandise in situ.
A framework in or on which articles may be placed or suspended.Gondola: An island counter used in self-service shops for the display of merchandise (OED)

definition-item.definition-title: Racks for dispensing merchandise (racks in general A47B; storing means for workshops B25H); Containers for dispensing merchandise (show or display aspects A47F3/00; for workshop fittings B25H3/00; containers in general B65D {; for liquids B67D}; coin-freed dispensers G07F)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Racks and containers for displaying and dispensing merchandise in shops, restaurants or other catering establishments. Display containers are considered to be containers which are filled with merchandise on the site of display.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Dispensing or devices for the dispensing of liquids
Vending machines, i.e. mostly coin-freed machines dispensing products (automatically) upon input of coins or tokens

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Show or display cases with dispensing means
Containers or packages with special means for dispensing contents

section-body.paragraph-text: Prefilled containers with dispensing means, which also have storage and transport purposes, are covered by the sub-class B65D.

definition-item.definition-title: for granulated or powdered materials {, i.e. bulk materials}

definition-item.definition-title: Show cases or show cabinets

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Cases, cabinets, counters and trays or the like for displaying articles and merchandise. This group mainly covers show cases, i.e. glass display cases for use in museums, galleries, shops or the like, and refrigerated cases, cabinets or counters for displaying merchandise in shops.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Display trays to be placed on the floor, mainly to be understood as comprising a support surface, e.g. tabletop, with walls extending upwardly around its circumference, thus providing for an enclosed space for displaying articles.

Closable containers for display purposes, mainly containers with transparent covers for viewing the contents.

section-body.paragraph-text: Racks or supports for supporting, storing or organizing specific articles should be covered in the field of the respective article.

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Show stands, hangers or shelves adapted for crockery, e.g. plates, glasses

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cabinets, cases or stands for record carriers

definition-item.definition-title: {for crockery, e.g. plates, glasses}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cabinets specially adapted for storing dishware

definition-item.definition-title: {for perishable goods}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Refrigerated or air-conditioned show cases or cabinets

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for plants or flowers}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Containers or packages for living plants

definition-item.definition-title: for jewellery, dentures, watches, eye-glasses, lenses, or the like

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Display stands for luxury goods, i.e. for jewellery, dentures, watches, eye-glasses, lenses, cameras, mobile phones, laptop computers or the like.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Receptacles or cases for spectacles, watches, jewellery or the like
Miscellaneous supports, holders or containers for household use

definition-item.definition-title: {for eye-glasses (A47F7/03 takes precedence; with theft prevention A47F7/0243)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Show stands, hangers or shelves adapted for eye-glasses with provisions for preventing unauthorised removal
Show stands, hangers or shelves adapted for jewellery, watches, eye-glasses or the like in boxes

definition-item.definition-title: {for watches or for bracelets therefor (A47F7/03 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Show stands, hangers or shelves adapted for jewellery, watches, eye-glasses or the like in boxes

definition-item.definition-title: with provisions for preventing unauthorised removal {(show cases with devices for prevention of theft A47F3/002; devices for locking portable objects against unauthorised removal E05B73/0017)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Show cases with devices for prevention against theft
Devices for locking portable objects against unauthorised removal
Theft alarms for portable items on display

definition-item.definition-title: {for rectangular articles, e.g. books, cassettes (on the article itself E05B73/0023)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for locking portable objects, in the form of containers, boxes, cases or the like, against unauthorised removal

definition-item.definition-title: of box shape; Adaptations of boxes to display purposes

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Receptacles or cases for spectacles, watches, jewellery or the like

definition-item.definition-title: for tyres; for wheels {(holders for bicycles B62H3/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Supplementary fittings on vehicle exterior for carrying loads, e.g. bicycles
Spare wheel stowing, holding or mounting arrangements

definition-item.definition-title: for hats {or wigs}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Display stands for hats, caps, helmets or the like.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for wigs (wig cases A45C11/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Display stands for wigs.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for shoes {(shoe hangers A47G25/005; shoe hangers with anti-theft means E05B69/003)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Shoe racks as an implement for the manufacture of shoes

definition-item.definition-title: for ties (household necktie holders A47G25/74); for collars {, belts, braces, zip fasteners}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for pictures, e.g. in combination with books or seed-bags {; for cards, magazines, newspapers, books or booklike articles, e.g. audio/video cassettes (racks or containers with dispensing arrangements A47F1/04; for cardboard panels, e.g. posters, A47F7/0042)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Racks or containers with dispensing arrangements
Display of pictures per se, picture frames
Cardboard or the like show cards of foldable or flexible material
Boards, hoardings, pillars or the like structures for notices, placards, posters or the like

definition-item.definition-title: {for only one article}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Display of pictures per se, picture frames
Supports or holders for show cards

definition-item.definition-title: {hanging or attached on show stands by means of brackets, clips, slits or the like}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for hanging or supporting pictures

definition-item.definition-title: {the show stands or the like being provided with compartments or pockets (with theft prevention A47F7/0246)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for carpets; for wallpaper; for textile materials {(for ceramic tiles A47F7/0042)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {in the form of flat shaped samples (G09F5/02; sample cards G09F5/04)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: in rolls or rolled tapes

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: For flexible long articles not on rolls

definition-item.definition-title: for clothing materials (A47F7/17 takes precedence {; for zip fasteners A47F7/12})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Mainly display of clothing fabrics on (two dimensional) human figures.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Show stands, hangers or shelves adapted for textile materials in rolls or rolled tapes

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Dress form, bust forms and stands for tailoring

definition-item.definition-title: for garments (for hosiery A47F7/10; for ties or collars A47F7/12; dummies, busts or the like A47F8/00; wardrobes with garment-holders A47B61/00; household implements used in connection with wearing apparel or dress holders, {e.g. garment supporting racks} A47G25/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Display stands for ties or collars
Systems for viewing or displaying garments virtually
Household implements used in connection with wearing apparel; dress holders, clothes and shoe hangers or garment supporting racks

definition-item.definition-title: Clothes racks {(A47G25/06 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Details of rods of clothes racks

definition-item.definition-title: extensible from a showcase

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for containers, e.g. flasks, bottles {, tins, milk packs (racks or containers with dispensing arrangements A47F1/04; for lipsticks or markers A47F7/0021; for audio/video cassettes or booklike articles A47F7/14)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Racks or containers with dispensing arrangements
For audio/video cassettes or booklike articles

definition-item.definition-title: {for vertically-stacked containers; Stabilising means therefor}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Show stands having sampling means, e.g. colour, taste, perfume}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for furniture, e.g. beds, mattresses

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Dummies, busts or the like, e.g. for displaying garments (tailors' dummies A41H5/00; {artificial limbs A61F; dolls in general A63H})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Dummies, busts or the like, e.g. for displaying garments
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Wire figures; Contour figures for displaying garments {(A47F7/10, A47F7/12 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Display stands for ties or collars

definition-item.definition-title: Shop, bar, bank or like counters (show cases or show cabinets A47F3/00; safety transaction partitions, e.g. movable pay plates, E05G7/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Primarily only the furniture aspects, i.e. the general arrangements or configurations, of shop, bar, bank or like counters.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Safety transaction partitions, e.g. movable pay plates
Record carriers or readers, e.g. bar code readers, per se

definition-item.definition-title: {with extendable shelves}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cabinets, racks or shelf units, having one or more surfaces adapted to be brought into position for use by extending

definition-item.definition-title: Paying counters {(change plates, coin dispensers with rotatable change dishes G07D)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Safety transaction partitions, e.g. movable pay plates
Change plates, coin dispensers with rotatable change dishes

definition-item.definition-title: Check-out counters, e.g. for self-service stores

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Shopping bags or carton-dispensing systems therefor}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Shopping bag or carton-dispensing systems specifically adapted for check-out counters.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machinery characterised by making rectangular envelopes or bags of flat form
Forming, feeding, opening or setting-up containers or receptacles in association with packaging
Apparatus or devices facilitating manual packaging operations; Sack holders
Details of, or accessories for, sacks or bags
Delivering articles from cutting or line-perforating machines, from or with devices for breaking partially-cut or perforated webs, e.g. bursters

definition-item.definition-title: {Arrangement of recording means in or on check-out counters (record carriers or readers per se G06K)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Record carriers or (bar-code) readers per se

definition-item.definition-title: Furniture or installations specially adapted to particular types of service systems, not otherwise provided for (conveyor aspects B65G; building aspects E04H; coin-freed apparatus G07F)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for self-service type systems, e.g. supermarkets (A47F10/06 takes precedence; hand-carts B62B; baskets B65D)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Furniture or installations for restaurant service systems

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for storing or handling self-service hand-carts or baskets

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hand carts having more than one axis carrying transport wheels, shopping trolleys

definition-item.definition-title: for restaurant service systems (table equipment A47G {; dirty crockery transport in association with crockery washing machines A47L15/00})

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Service or tea trolleys or wagons
Heated food display cases, e.g. chafers
Dirty crockery transport in association with crockery washing machines

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements in shop windows, {shop floors} or show cases

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Arrangements in shop windows, on shop floors or in show cases specifically for display purposes and for bringing about special optical effects, and arrangements of lighting devices in show cases, show windows or the like.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Removable walls {, scaffolding or the like}; Pillars; Special curtains or the like

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Means for bringing about special optical effects

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Non-reflecting shop-windows

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Surface treatment of glass, e.g. coatings

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements of light sources

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
This sub-group mainly covers showcases with lighting and the arrangement of lighting devices in showcases.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Structural combinations of lighting devices with furniture

section-body.paragraph-text: Lighting devices per se for use in show cases can be found in A47F3/001.

definition-item.definition-title: Shop or like accessories (devices for drawing-off and cutting paper from a roll B65H; movably-mounted ladders E06C9/06)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Accessories, tools or equipment specifically for use in shops.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for drawing-off and cutting paper from a roll

definition-item.definition-title: Reaching devices (having gripping means B25J)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Hand implements, e.g. grocers' scoops, ladles, paper-bag holders

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Shopping-bag holders (A47F9/042 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Shopping bag or carton-dispensing systems specifically for use with check-out counters

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machinery characterised by making rectangular envelopes or bags of flat form
Forming, feeding, opening or setting-up containers or receptacles in association with packaging
Apparatus or devices facilitating manual packaging operations; Sack holders
Details of, or accessories for, sacks or bags
Delivering articles from cutting or line-perforating machines, from or with devices for breaking partially-cut or perforated webs, e.g. bursters
